content.title: FMD Family Screening
content.description: Screening recommendations for first-degree relatives of patients with fibromuscular dysplasia

key_concepts.details: Approximately 7-11% of FMD patients have affected first-degree relatives
Consider screening first-degree relatives, especially if severe presentation or aneurysm
Noninvasive imaging (CTA or MRA) from brain to pelvis preferred
No consensus; may begin screening in young adulthood if family history significant

content.clinical_significance: Early detection may prevent complications in asymptomatic family members
